attributes.action: Referendum on the terms of any agreement for withdrawal from the European Union
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to bring to the prior approval of the People of the United Kingdom (aged 16 and over) the terms of any agreement for the withdrawal of the United Kingdom from the European Union and on its future relationship with the European Union, resulting from the operation of Article 50 of the Treaty on European Union, should Article 50 be triggered.
attributes.background: Call for a referendum on the terms of any agreement for the withdrawal of the United Kingdom from the European Union and on its future relationship with the European Union.
